title: stack
description: The `stack` object stores and retrieves messages using either a First-In, First-Out (FIFO) or Last-In, First-Out (LIFO) order, functioning as a queue or a traditional stack data structure. It allows users to push messages onto the stack, retrieve them one by one with a `bang`, or dump all stored messages. The object also provides control over its internal `[text]` window and reports the number of stored elements.
